About Our Project

Our responsive Bootstrap site is built with modern design principles in mind, combining light and dark elements for excellent visual contrast. Each page showcases different Bootstrap components and demonstrates how responsive design enhances user experience across devices.

Accessibility is a top priority: we ensure keyboard navigation, proper contrast, readable fonts, and responsive layouts. The navigation is always accessible, and pages adapt fluidly from mobile screens to desktops.

We also leverage Bootstrap's grid and utility classes while enhancing the design with custom styles via external CSS. Media queries are included to fine-tune layout adjustments and ensure clarity on all screen sizes.

We aim to build modern, responsive websites using accessible, scalable web technologies.

This site uses Bootstrap 5, custom CSS, JavaScript, and accessibility-first design practices.
